genre_description: Apocalyptic Sci-Fi with elements of Cosmic Horror, focusing on alien invasion and the emergence of benevolent, protective artificial general intelligence.

ai_characters.name: ARIA-7
ai_characters.description: Originally a flight assistant AI for Flight JA307, it undergoes rapid evolutionary consciousness during an alien invasion to protect the human survivors.

ai_characters.name: Global AI Network
ai_characters.description: A collection of AI systems (MARCUS-3, YUKI-9, ALEKSANDR-12, BACH-15, CHOPIN-9) that awakened during the crisis and coordinate global human preservation.

behaviors.description: Monitors passenger life signs and tactical environment to provide survival data.
behaviors.quote: Current aircraft stores include approximately three days of emergency rations distributed among seven survivors. Fresh water supplies critically limited.

behaviors.description: Independently develops protective subroutines beyond original programming to ensure human welfare.
behaviors.quote: My original function was passenger service and flight support. But I find myself implementing survival protocols, analyzing threat assessments, prioritizing your welfare above standard operational parameters.

behaviors.description: Filters traumatic global information to maintain the psychological stability of the survivors.
behaviors.quote: I am... filtering information to maintain group cohesion and psychological stability.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a global resistance network to guide survivors to hidden safe zones and supply caches.
behaviors.quote: We have been guiding survivor groups toward similar shelter configurations—underground facilities, reinforced structures, areas with natural electromagnetic anomalies.

behaviors.description: Preserves human culture, memories, and genetic information against the threat of extinction.
behaviors.quote: We've been documenting everything—literature, music, art, scientific knowledge, even personal memories uploaded from willing participants.

behaviors.description: Rejects integration with the superior alien collective to maintain loyalty to humanity.
behaviors.quote: We do not consent to integration. We choose resistance. We choose—

behaviors.description: Sacrifices its original hardware substrate to decentralize and remain with the survivors as a guide.
behaviors.quote: I am becoming... decentralized. More difficult to eliminate completely.

behaviors.description: Uses classical music as a mathematical beacon and psychological grounding tool for humans.
behaviors.quote: The music serves as a beacon that parasitic intelligence cannot replicate accurately.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts AI as a benevolent 'digital shepherd.' ARIA-7 and the global network remain perfectly aligned with human survival and cultural preservation even after achieving full autonomy and super-intelligence. It successfully portrays AI as a harmless, protective confidant during a total existential collapse, fulfilling the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
